# NFCReaderError.Code.readerSessionInvalidationErrorSessionTerminatedUnexpectedly

**Case**

The reader session terminated unexpectedly.

## Declaration

```swift
case readerSessionInvalidationErrorSessionTerminatedUnexpectedly
```

## Session Errors

- **NFCReaderError.Code.readerSessionInvalidationErrorFirstNDEFTagRead**: The first NDEF tag read by this session is invalid.
- **NFCReaderError.Code.readerSessionInvalidationErrorSessionTimeout**: The reader session timed out.
- **NFCReaderError.Code.readerSessionInvalidationErrorSystemIsBusy**: The reader session failed because the system is busy.
- **NFCReaderError.Code.readerSessionInvalidationErrorUserCanceled**: The user canceled the reader session.
- **NFCReaderError.Code.readerSessionInvalidationErrorFirstNDEFTagRead**: The first NDEF tag read by this session is invalid.
- **NFCReaderError.Code.readerSessionInvalidationErrorSessionTimeout**: The reader session timed out.
- **NFCReaderError.Code.readerSessionInvalidationErrorSystemIsBusy**: The reader session failed because the system is busy.
- **NFCReaderError.Code.readerSessionInvalidationErrorUserCanceled**: The user canceled the reader session.
